# The Queen (2012 film)

| runtime        = 91 minutes

The Queen () is a 2012 Iranian film directed by Mohammad Ali Bashe Ahangar
Cast
* Milad Keymaram as Siavosh
* Mostafa Zamani as Jamshid
* Mehdi Soltani as Amjad
* Hooman Barghnavard
* Homayoun Ershadi
* Hamid Reza Azarang as Saifollah
* Malek Seraj
* Mojtaba Asvadian
* Hossein Ahangar as Mousa
